The correct answer is D: [00:05:00 - 00:05:19]. 

In this segment of the video, the speaker starts by discussing his favorite camera setup, which includes the DJIOM4. He mentions that he uses the gimbal to stabilize his phone and that he can charge his iPhone using the gimbal's USB-C port. As the video progresses, the speaker shows off some tricks for shooting quick gimbal shots, including how to use an app to control the gimbal remotely. The visuals in the clip transition between the speaker at his desk with the gimbal to an outdoor scene by a stone bridge, where a police boat and a red cable can be seen.

The correct answer is A: [00:05:19 - 00:06:14]. 

In the provided excerpt, the speaker mentions that after shooting a lot of videos on his iPhone 13 Pro Max, he goes into the FilmiC Pro app to edit them. He explains how he uses the app to control various settings such as focus, exposure, white balance, ISO, and shutter speed. Therefore, this segment displays the "FILMIC PRO APP" title and the FilmiC Pro interface while the speaker discusses using the app.
